title: Chapter XXVI - Life Sciences Research and Development
content:
Chapter XXVI - Life Sciences Research and Development

State Regulations

Part 260 - Life Sciences Research and Development Tax Credit Program (§ 260.1 to 260.12)

Part 270 - New York City Musical and Theatrical Production Tax Credit Program (§ 270.1 to 270.10)

Part 280 - Restaurant Return-to-Work Tax Credit Program (§ 280.1 to 280.9)

Part 290

Part 300 - [Effective until 1/21/2023]
Part 310 - Empire State 9/11 Notice Program (§ 310.1 to 310.3)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Part 260 - Life Sciences Research and Development Tax Credit Program (§ 260.1 to 260.12)

Part 270 - New York City Musical and Theatrical Production Tax Credit Program (§ 270.1 to 270.10)
